'''Lizzy''' was a homeless woman portrayed by [[Beth Grant]] in [[The One With The Thumb]].

[[Phoebe Buffay|Phoebe]] regularly visits her to give her food and other essentials. When Phoebe's bank account was accidentally credited with $1000 and a football phone, she gave these to Lizzy. As a thank-you, Lizzy offered Phoebe her model XK-7 SatNavBlok Tinfoil Hat, but ultimately bought Phoebe [[The One With The Thumb|a soda with a thumb in it]].
